snippet.title: Dogfight: A Sausage Bomber Story - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description: Dogfight: A Sausage Bomber Story is a classic arcade shoot em' up featuring four difficulty levels, as well as a speedrun mode that dynamically scales the intensity of the game. Beat missions to progress through the game and unlock 24 new weapons to equip onto different loadout combinations. Go at it alone or with up to 4 players in drop-in/drop-out cooperative play. Dogfight: A Sausage Bomber Story is launching on April 13 for PlayStation 4, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.
